ABOUT_US.TITLE: Who are we?
ABOUT_US.ABOUT_SPORTPXL: Sportpxl is a combination of technical profiles, competitive athletes and image enthusiasts.
ABOUT_US.OUR_GOAL: Our goal: provide a tailored service to all sports photographers and grow this activity we love so much.
ABOUT_US.ABOUT_GILLEN: For nearly 10 years, Guillaume and Gillen, the founders of Sportpxl, have experienced sport from both sides: as athletes and as contributors to its digital transformation.

SPORTPXL_BIRTH.SPORTPXL_BIRTH_2: that Sportpxl was born. Sportpxl was designed and developed to meet the needs of many stakeholders in amateur and professional sports.

ABOUT_US.AROUND_SPORTPXL: By staying close to the different stakeholders in sports events, both professionally and personally, Sportpxl stands at the heart of this rapidly growing ecosystem.

THOMAS_HELP.THOMAS_HELP: With the support of Thomas and several business angels from the digital and innovation sectors, the team has one mission:

ABOUT_US.ECO_TEXT: We reduce our environmental impact through sustainable practices: optimized cloud storage and limited travel.
ABOUT_US.INNOVATION_TEXT: We believe in collaboration and shared innovation to design high-performance technological solutions.
ABOUT_US.REVOLUTION_TEXT: Supporting amateur and professional photographers without disrupting their habits is at the core of our approach.
ABOUT_US.DEVELOPMENT_TEXT: By providing new monetization and engagement opportunities, we actively support the promotion and accessibility of sport.

CONFIRM_MODAL.CONFIRM_CHECK: I confirm the creation of this invoice
